weapon_description: Bold Burkina from the Scions of the Canopy once made this weapon with the hero Tenoch's help — all for the sake of obtaining Flamegranates unmatched throughout Natlan.
weapon_skill_description: Increase Plunging Attack CRIT Rate by 32%; After a Plunging Attack hits an opponent, Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG increased by 32% for 10s.
